cause.description:
This is an organization that represents our furry friends who cannot speak for themselves. This is a cause that will improve the lives of all bunnies who participate in magic performances without pay.
1. Bunnies deserve Pay
2. Pay is a universal right for all bunnies
3. Improve the lives of Bunnies of color.
cause.mission: Give the Bunnies of America a chance to be heard!
cause.name: United Association of Bunnies Against Magic
